description: Modern and athletic, the Outblast TS CSWP offers all the warmth and protection you need for cold winter days, in a sleek silhouette that also looks great in the city. Thinsulate™ insulation and a winter insole keep feet toasty in icy, snowy conditions, while the Contagrip® outsole delivers aggressive traction in snow, wet, mud, or slick surfaces.
name: Salomon Outblast TS CSWP - Mens
